channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Radius PCV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Radius PCV

item.title: CVE-2022-40723|2024-08-03T12:21:46.787Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20radius%20pcv
item.description: The PingID RADIUS PCV adapter for PingFederate, which supports RADIUS authentication with PingID MFA, is vulnerable to MFA bypass under certain configurations.
